data.name: Heredity: The Eternal Curse
data.detailed_description:
Heredity: The Eternal Curse is an action RPG dungeon crawler that takes place in the terrifying realm of murder without death. Massacre your way through endless hordes of genetic monstrosities, absorb the blood of the fallen to inherit their abilities, and never stop moving lest they rebirth to repay the favor. Succeed and you might just uncover the truth behind the curse that is eternal life.

Create the genetic nightmare of your dreams
Mix and match from 13+ Horrors to create a monstrosity of over 200,000 biological permutations. Every limb has a unique ability and style of gameplay to discover and use to advance through your journey.


Push forward gameplay
Never stop killing. Never stop moving. Unless, of course, a challenge suits you. The fallen recover quickly and stronger than ever. Those who are brave enough to stand their ground and face the incessant horde might live long enough to reap the rewards. But beware, the horde will always prevail in the end. Will greed be your worst enemy?



Explore a dynamic and bizarre new world
The influence of blood sweeps the land and mutates all that has life. Terrain and vegetation will inherit the features of the Horrors that live and fall upon it. Be conscious of your surroundings and you will better anticipate the challenge that lies ahead

Seek answers in the face of eternal life
Follow the adventure of a disoriented youngling, trying to make sense of a strange new world that appears to be a timeless prison. Death is temporary, and murder is the world's favorite pastime. Perhaps if you best them at their own game, you'll find answers to ease the crippling thoughts of living such a life for all eternity.


Join us on Discord
Join the community for an inside look at the development of Heredity. Give us your thoughts and help shape the future of the game.
